description: Bananas are tropical fruits rich in potassium and fiber. They're great for a quick energy boost and commonly eaten as a natural snack.
Watermelons are refreshing fruits with high water content, perfect for staying hydrated in hot weather. They’re also rich in antioxidants like lycopene.
Grapes are small, sweet fruits that grow in clusters. They can be eaten fresh, dried into raisins, or used to make wine and juice.
